original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:🔽For example, a person who has not yet seen a heap of filth smells the foul stench of it.

original: dper na / mi zhig mi gtsang ba'i phung po da dung gi bar du ma mthong gis kyang dri nga ba'i dri mnam pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba da dung gi bar du ma mthong gis kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po'i mtshan ma mchog tu 'jigs shing drag🔽pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na / mi zhig mi gtsang ba'i phung po da dung gi bar du ma mthong gis kyang dri nga ba'i dri mnam pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba da dung gi bar du ma mthong gis kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po'i mtshan ma mchog tu 'jigs shing drag pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, a sign of the great hell appears to the person who has not yet seen the hell beings, a sign that is extremely frightening and terrible.🔽All evil views and speech are terrifying.

original: ngan par lta zhing smra ba thams cad skrag par byed de; skye po byis pas bsgrubs pa nyes par byas pa'i zong /
analyzed: ngan par lta zhing smra ba thams cad skrag par byed de; skye po byis pas bsgrubs pa nyes par byas pa'i zong /
translated: The goods of evil deeds accumulated by childish beings

original: sems can dmyal bar brin pa'i rin /
analyzed: sems can dmyal bar brin pa'i rin /
translated: are sold in the hells.🔽The wind there, pippalaka and sucukā,

original: der gnas pa'i rnam par smin pas de'i rlung pi pa la ka dang / su ca ka shin tu drag pa @347a *//
analyzed: der gnas pa'i rnam par smin pas de'i rlung pi pa la ka dang / su ca ka shin tu drag pa @347a *//
translated: is extremely strong.

original: dag gis yan lag dang / nyid lag rnam par skul bar byed /🔽rnam par rdung bar byed /
analyzed: dag gis yan lag dang / nyid lag rnam par skul bar byed / rnam par rdung bar byed /
translated: It agitates the major and minor body parts.🔽It beats them up.

original: rnam par gsheg par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par gsheg par byed do //
translated: It tears them apart.

original: de'i lus bdo ba na /
analyzed: de'i lus bdo ba na /
translated: When his body is stretched out,

original: de'i sems srid pa tha ma la tshor  ba gnyis kyis gdungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i sems srid pa tha ma la tshor  ba gnyis kyis gdungs pa yin te /
translated: The mind of that being in the final phase of life is tormented by two feelings.

original: de srid pa tha ma pa la sems kyi dmigs pa legs par spyad pa'i 'du shes su byed do //
analyzed: de srid pa tha ma pa la sems kyi dmigs pa legs par spyad pa'i 'du shes su byed do //
translated: That being in the final phase of life is made to perceive the object of his mind as a good action.

original: de lta bas na mi'i 'jig rten nas rang gis byas shing  bslus pa srid pa bar ma la sems can dmyal bar myong bar 'gyur ba'i ltas dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bas na mi'i 'jig rten nas rang gis byas shing  bslus pa srid pa bar ma la sems can dmyal bar myong bar 'gyur ba'i ltas dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni /
translated: Therefore, in the human world, the signs of the karma to be experienced in the hells that are created and deceived by oneself appear in the intermediate existence.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: snying gi lam la sgra dang / reg pa dang / ro dang / gzugs dang / dri mi 'dod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: snying gi lam la sgra dang / reg pa dang / ro dang / gzugs dang / dri mi 'dod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: Unwanted sounds, textures, tastes, forms, and smells appear on the path of the heart.

original: sems can dmyal ba pa dag gi gzugs mi sdug pa'i sgra skad thos pa dang / rlung reg pa spu gri lta bus reg par byed pa dang / ro tsha ba'i ro myong bar byed pa dang / gzugs 'jigs par ston pa rab tu gdung ba lta bur byas pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa dag gi gzugs mi sdug pa'i sgra skad thos pa dang / rlung reg pa spu gri lta bus reg par byed pa dang / ro tsha ba'i ro myong bar byed pa dang / gzugs 'jigs par ston pa rab tu gdung ba lta bur byas pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: The sounds of the ugly forms of hell beings are heard, the texture of a razor wind touches, the taste of a hot taste is experienced, and forms that display fear are seen, as if burning with intense heat.

original: dri nga ba'i rdzas bsags pa'i dri dag mnam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dri nga ba'i rdzas bsags pa'i dri dag mnam par 'gyur ro //
translated: The smell of the accumulation of foul substances will be smelled.

original: de ltar yul thams cad kyis skrag pa sems can dmyal ba shin tu log par lta bas mthong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar yul thams cad kyis skrag pa sems can dmyal ba shin tu log par lta bas mthong bar 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, the hell being who has wrong views will see all objects as terrifying.

original: ji ltar des chos log par bstan pa de ltar sems can dmyal ba des mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar des chos log par bstan pa de ltar sems can dmyal ba des mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As he has taught the Dharma wrongly, he will see the hells in that way.

original: de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: He will think,

original: kye ma / yul grong khyer gyi tshul dang mthun pa 'dir dga'/
analyzed: kye ma / yul grong khyer gyi tshul dang mthun pa 'dir dga'/
translated: “Oh, this object is like a city. It is delightful.

original: der bdag ji ltar 'jug par bya snyam ste /
analyzed: der bdag ji ltar 'jug par bya snyam ste /
translated: How can I enter it?”

original: de la 'dod par byed do //
analyzed: de la 'dod par byed do //
translated: He will desire it.

original: de srid pa'i yan @347b lag myong bar 'gyur ba rig nas der skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de srid pa'i yan @347b lag myong bar 'gyur ba rig nas der skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Having recognized the experience of the limbs of existence, he will be born there.

original: nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ba der sems bskyed ma thag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ba der sems bskyed ma thag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Conditioned by grasping, existence will arise. As soon as the thought arises, he will be born there.

original: der skyes ma thag tu gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad bcu 'gyur du 'gyur ngo //
analyzed: der skyes ma thag tu gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad bcu 'gyur du 'gyur ngo //
translated: As soon as he is born there, all the sufferings of the Reviving Hell and so on will be ten times worse.

original: nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'ang 'byung ste /
analyzed: nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'ang 'byung ste /
translated: The four hundred and four diseases arise.

original: drag pa sems can dmyal ba dang mtshungs pa /
analyzed: drag pa sems can dmyal ba dang mtshungs pa /
translated: The severe ones are like those of the hells.

original: gcig gi dper gcig rung ba /
analyzed: gcig gi dper gcig rung ba /
translated: One example is suitable for all.

original: don thams cad med par byed cing 'jigs par byed pa nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bur gyur pa dag yin no //
analyzed: don thams cad med par byed cing 'jigs par byed pa nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bur gyur pa dag yin no //
translated: They destroy all meaning and cause fear. They are the results of misdeeds.

original: me'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: me'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: This kind of fire arises:

original: gang til 'bru tsam gyis ri dang / nags tshal dang / tshong rdal dang / gling dang bcas pa dag sreg na sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: gang til 'bru tsam gyis ri dang / nags tshal dang / tshong rdal dang / gling dang bcas pa dag sreg na sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: If it burns mountains, forests, markets, and continents, the size of a sesame seed, what need is there to mention the bodies of hell beings?

original: des mar sar gyi gong bu bzhin du sreg go /
analyzed: des mar sar gyi gong bu bzhin du sreg go /
translated: It burns them like a lump of butter.

original: de nas yang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas yang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then it arises again.

original: nyin dang / mtshan mor mi mngon zhing mun par zhugs pa na lo 'bum phrag du mar gnod pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba thams cad mun pa mun gang tu gyur pa /
analyzed: nyin dang / mtshan mor mi mngon zhing mun par zhugs pa na lo 'bum phrag du mar gnod pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba thams cad mun pa mun gang tu gyur pa /
translated: Day and night, invisible, entering the darkness, for many hundreds of thousands of years, all that sinks into the ocean of harm becomes completely dark.

original: log par lta ba byas shing bsags la bsten pa dag gi 'bras bus de 'di ltar lo dpag tu med cing bgrang gis mi lang bar de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du sdug bsngal dang / tsha ba dpe med pas 'tshed do //
analyzed: log par lta ba byas shing bsags la bsten pa dag gi 'bras bus de 'di ltar lo dpag tu med cing bgrang gis mi lang bar de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du sdug bsngal dang / tsha ba dpe med pas 'tshed do //
translated: The result of the karma of wrong view, which is accumulated and relied upon, is that for countless, innumerable years, until that evil karma is destroyed, abandoned, and exhausted, one is boiled and burned by incomparable suffering and heat.

original: sreg go / de sems can dmyal ba'i yun ring po de las 'das nas gal te sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /🔽thar nas @348a *//🔽kyang tshe rabs lnga brgyar yi dvags ser sna can zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sreg go / de sems can dmyal ba'i yun ring po de las 'das nas gal te sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te / thar nas @348a *// kyang tshe rabs lnga brgyar yi dvags ser sna can zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: After a long time in hell, if one escapes from that hell,🔽one will be born as a hungry ghost called “miser” for five hundred lifetimes.

original: de nas thar nas kyang tshe rabs lnga brgyar dud 'gro thams cad kyis sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa der skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas thar nas kyang tshe rabs lnga brgyar dud 'gro thams cad kyis sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa der skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: After that, one will be born as an animal for five hundred lifetimes, experiencing all the suffering of animals.

original: gal te brgya la gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
analyzed: gal te brgya la gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na /
translated: If by some rare chance karma to be experienced in other lives causes them to be born with the general lot in life of a human,🔽

original: log par lta ba de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de kla klo'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur zhing dbul ba dang / nad dang / long ba dang / lag rdum dang / nad bu can du 'gyur /
analyzed: log par lta ba de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de kla klo'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur zhing dbul ba dang / nad dang / long ba dang / lag rdum dang / nad bu can du 'gyur /
translated: “If, with the likelihood of a sea turtle poking its head through a yoke floating on the ocean, such a person should by the power of karma to be experienced in other lives be born with the general lot in life of a human, due to the causally concordant effects of their wrong views they will be born in a barbarian border region, be poor, sickly, blind, crippled, or sickly.

original: tshe thung ba dang / tshig yid mi ches par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //🔽de nas gzhan yang /
analyzed: tshe thung ba dang / tshig yid mi ches par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas gzhan yang /
translated: They will have a short life and their words will not be trusted.

original: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i 'khor la brtags na /
analyzed: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i 'khor la brtags na /
translated: “Next, the monk who has knowledge of the ripening of karmic effects will examine the regions that surround the great Hell of Heat.

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba rab tu sreg pa chen po zhes bya ba yod pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba rab tu sreg pa chen po zhes bya ba yod pa mthong ngo //
translated: With knowledge derived from hearing he will notice a neighboring realm of the great hell of Saṃjīva known as Great Burning.

original: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
analyzed: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
translated: What type of karma causes beings to be born there?

original: gang gis srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chang 'thung ba dang / rdzun smra ba dang / log par lta ba las dang / 'bras bu mi mthun par ston pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chang 'thung ba dang / rdzun smra ba dang / log par lta ba las dang / 'bras bu mi mthun par ston pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ro //
translated: Inquiring with wisdom derived from hearing, he will notice that this happens when one has relied upon, become habituated with, and increased acts of killing, taking what was not given, sexual misconduct, alcohol consumption, lying, and wrong views.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,🔽it is said that those who kill will be born as gods in the next life.

original: srog gcod @348b pa byas na srog gcod pa po tshe phyi ma la lha rnams su skye'o zhes zer ba de ni 'di ltar las dang / 'bras bu mi mthun par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: srog gcod @348b pa byas na srog gcod pa po tshe phyi ma la lha rnams su skye'o zhes zer ba de ni 'di ltar las dang / 'bras bu mi mthun par ston pa yin no //
translated: This is a teaching that does not accord with the law of karma and its results.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: srog chags rnams kyi snying la ches sdug bsngal ba med pa ma yin la /
analyzed: srog chags rnams kyi snying la ches sdug bsngal ba med pa ma yin la /
translated: There is nothing more painful to living beings than killing.

original: 'di ltar lha rnams su skyes pa dag la ches bde ba med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar lha rnams su skyes pa dag la ches bde ba med pa ma yin te /
translated: There is nothing more blissful than being born as a god.

original: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu srog gcod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa ni bde ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu srog gcod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa ni bde ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur /
translated: The causes of suffering, such as killing, are not the causes of happiness.

original: sdug bsngal yang bde ba'i las kyi 'bras bur mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang bde ba'i las kyi 'bras bur mi 'gyur te /
translated: Suffering is not the result of happy actions.

original: log par lta ba rnam pa de dag ston par byed pa de ni las de dang 'bras bu mi mthun par ston pa yin no; ;de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rab tu sreg pa chen por skye bar 'gyur ro
analyzed: log par lta ba rnam pa de dag ston par byed pa de ni las de dang 'bras bu mi mthun par ston pa yin no; ;de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rab tu sreg pa chen por skye bar 'gyur ro
translated: “Those who teach such wrong views are teaching that actions and their results are incompatible. When they separate from their bodies, they fall into the lower realms, into the great hell of Intense Heat.

original: // der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: // der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “The following tortures will befall them there:

original: gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs par ji ltar bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad bcu 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs par ji ltar bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad bcu 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
translated: All the tortures that are experienced in the Reviving Hell and the other hells are experienced here, but multiplied tenfold.

original: rang gi lus las kyang kun nas mi 'byung ste /🔽rnam pa de lta bur rab tu sreg pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi lus las kyang kun nas mi 'byung ste /🔽rnam pa de lta bur rab tu sreg pa ni /
translated: The tortures are not only experienced in the body,🔽but also in the mind.

original: gang las byas pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i me'i phyi rol na gnas pa bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do //
analyzed: gang las byas pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i me'i phyi rol na gnas pa bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do //
translated: The fire of the hell beings that is produced from that karma is not even a sixteenth part of the heat of the fire that is outside of that hell.

original: me de'i mdog kha ba 'dra la rnam pa de lta bus de rab tu sreg par byed de /
analyzed: me de'i mdog kha ba 'dra la rnam pa de lta bus de rab tu sreg par byed de /
translated: The color of that fire is like snow, and it burns in that way.

original: de'i phyi nang thams cad rab tu tshig go /
analyzed: de'i phyi nang thams cad rab tu tshig go /
translated: It burns everything inside and outside.

original: yid la gcags pa las byung ba'i me gzhan gsum pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /🔽des kyang sems can @349a *//
analyzed: yid la gcags pa las byung ba'i me gzhan gsum pa 'byung bar 'gyur te / des kyang sems can @349a *//
translated: A third fire arises, which is the fire of regret.

original: dmyal ba pa de sreg go /
analyzed: dmyal ba pa de sreg go /
translated: That fire burns the hell being.

original: log par lta ba de phyis 'di ltar log par lta ba'i 'bras bu ni tsha'o //
analyzed: log par lta ba de phyis 'di ltar log par lta ba'i 'bras bu ni tsha'o //
translated: Later, the one with wrong view will understand that the result of wrong view is burning,

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni tsha'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni tsha'o //
translated: that the ripening result is burning,

original: ro myang ba ni tsha'o zhes mngon par shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ro myang ba ni tsha'o zhes mngon par shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: and that the experience is burning.

original: de me gsum gyis mngon par sreg pa ni skad cig tsam yang bde ba mi 'thob ste /
analyzed: de me gsum gyis mngon par sreg pa ni skad cig tsam yang bde ba mi 'thob ste /
translated: Burned by those three fires, he does not obtain any happiness for even a moment.

original: sems can dmyal ba tsha ba'i 'khor rab tu sreg pa chen por 'di ltar nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dpyad pa de /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba tsha ba'i 'khor rab tu sreg pa chen por 'di ltar nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dpyad pa de /
translated: In this way, the one who has investigated the consequences of his misdeeds in the great burning of the hell of extreme burning, which is a neighboring region of the Saṃjīva hell,

original: der lo grangs med par yun ring mo zhig tu 'tshed de /
analyzed: der lo grangs med par yun ring mo zhig tu 'tshed de /
translated: For a long time, for many years, they are boiled there.

original: de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du de sreg go /
analyzed: de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du de sreg go /
translated: For as long as their negative acts have not been overcome, relinquished, and exhausted, they will continue to be burned,

original: 'ched do // rnam par 'jig par byed do //
analyzed: 'ched do // rnam par 'jig par byed do //
translated: boiled, and destroyed.

original: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
translated: Later, when they escape from that hell,

original: thar nas tshe rabs sum brgyar yi dvags rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thar nas tshe rabs sum brgyar yi dvags rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will be born among the hungry ghosts for three hundred lives.

original: che rabs nyis brgyar dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: che rabs nyis brgyar dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For two hundred lives they will be born as animals.

original: de de las thar nas gal te brgya la mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na da pha ma la rim gro bya ba btang zhing sgra skad 'byin par 'gyur /
analyzed: de de las thar nas gal te brgya la mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na da pha ma la rim gro bya ba btang zhing sgra skad 'byin par 'gyur /
translated: If, with extremely rare good fortune, they escape from there and are born with the general lot in life of a human, they will have abandoned the care of their parents and will be mute.

original: mi gtsang ba zhing yul nas yul gzhan du rgyu ba dang / dam pa'i chos dang bral ba dang / skye bo kun gyis smad pa dang / bza' ba dang / gnas pa'i khyi'i spyod lam dang mtshungs pa dang / rkang lag la thor pa 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: mi gtsang ba zhing yul nas yul gzhan du rgyu ba dang / dam pa'i chos dang bral ba dang / skye bo kun gyis smad pa dang / bza' ba dang / gnas pa'i khyi'i spyod lam dang mtshungs pa dang / rkang lag la thor pa 'byung ba dang /
translated: They will move from one impure place to another, be separated from the sacred Dharma, be despised by everyone, and their behavior will be like that of dogs, who eat and then sleep.

original: pha rol gyi bsod snyoms kyi zas gsob gsog tu myur pa zos nas mi'i tshe 'di nyid la 'chi @349b bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: pha rol gyi bsod snyoms kyi zas gsob gsog tu myur pa zos nas mi'i tshe 'di nyid la 'chi @349b bar 'gyur te /
translated: They will have calluses on their hands and feet, and after quickly eating the scraps of food offered by others, they will die in this very life.

original: de ltar log par lta ba ni thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha mar mi 'dod pa 'byung ba dge slong des mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ltar log par lta ba ni thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha mar mi 'dod pa 'byung ba dge slong des mthong ngo //
translated: Thus, the monk sees that wrong views lead to undesirable results in the beginning, in the middle, and in the end.

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba ni blo'i sngon du 'gro zhing de kho na nyid mthong la yang dag pa'i lam la rab tu gnas pa mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba na sngon du 'dren pa yin par mthong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba ni blo'i sngon du 'gro zhing de kho na nyid mthong la yang dag pa'i lam la rab tu gnas pa mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba na sngon du 'dren pa yin par mthong ngo //
translated: He sees that right view is the forerunner of the mind, the seeing of reality, and the guide that leads to the path of the noble ones and to nirvāṇa.”

analyzed: ji ltar mi gtsang ba thams cad kyi nang na log par lta ba kun mi gtsang ba de bzhin du me thams cad kyi nang na me 'di kun tsha'o //

analyzed: chu 'bab pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba dang / sems can dmyal ba pa gzhan dag la smras pa /

analyzed: brgyugs pa dang / kha cig mdag me'i chu bo gang ba dag tu bying ngo /

analyzed: brgyugs pa dang / spa'i lcug ma rab tu 'bar ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /

analyzed: de dag gis yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dkri dkris na nyams /

analyzed: rnam par nyams par byas te /

analyzed: rus pa dang / rkang tsam zhig yod par byas so //

original: de nas yang skye bar 'gyur te /

original: de la za'o //
analyzed: de la za'o //

analyzed: de la de dag thams cad kyis snga ma bzhin du re zhig mig la 'phyang 'phyang nas mig za'o //

original: sred pas nyam thag pa long bar gyur pa de der rgyug go /
analyzed: sred pas nyam thag pa long bar gyur pa de der rgyug go /

original: brgyugs pa na srin bu gzhan dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: brgyugs pa na srin bu gzhan dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /

analyzed: de nas yang mig nas 'byung ste /

analyzed: de la'ang za ste /

analyzed: de ltar lo 'bum phrag du ma'i bar du za za nas skye bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: yongs su rgyug pa na'ang gal te yang padma dkar po'i tshal de dag dang phrad na /

analyzed: de der zhugs pa dang / padma dkar po de dag 'phang du dpag tshad lnga'o //

analyzed: me 'bar ba'i padma dkar po de la las kyis bslus pa dag 'jeg go /

analyzed: 'dzeg bzhin du de dag re ba med cing shin tu sdug bsngal la bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen pa de dag me mdag padma dkar po lta bus sreg go /
translated: Those who are tormented by hunger and thirst are burned by the white lotuses that are like burning embers.

original: 'tshed do // 'chi zhing skye'o //
analyzed: 'tshed do // 'chi zhing skye'o //

original: lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad bsregs pa shing ming shu ka lta bu'i lus dag ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du yun ring por gnod pa myong bar 'gyur ro //

translated: His body, like a sukalika plant, is burned in all its major and minor body parts. For as long as the force of his misdeeds has not been overcome, relinquished, and exhausted, he will continue to experience these harms for a long time.

original: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /

analyzed: thar nas kyang tshe rabs bzhi brgyar yi dvags bkres shing skom par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de las thar nas kyang tshe rabs sum brgyar dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When he escapes that, he will be born three hundred times as an animal.

translated: If, with the likelihood of a sea turtle poking its head through a yoke floating on the ocean, he should by some chance experience birth as a human due to karmic actions to be experienced in other lives,

original: des log par lta ba spyad cing nyes par byas pa'i las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de mtshon gyis 'khrug cing mu ge dang / tshom rkun rab tu mang ba'i yul rnams su skye bar 'gyur /

translated: As the result of engaging in wrong views and the corresponding misdeeds, they will be born in places where there are many weapons, famines, and thieves.

original: der skyes nas kyang dbul zhing nad bu can dang / gzhan gyis bskol cing sdug phongs par gyur la dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
analyzed: der skyes nas kyang dbul zhing nad bu can dang / gzhan gyis bskol cing sdug phongs par gyur la dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
translated: Once born there, they will be poor and sickly, and they will be exploited by others, become destitute, and have incomplete faculties.

original: de nas yang dge slong @351b las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can /
analyzed: de nas yang dge slong @351b las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can /
translated: “Next, the monk who has knowledge of the ripening of karmic effects will examine the regions that surround the Hell of Heat.

original: dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i 'khor la brtags na des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba sprul 'khyil ba lta bu zhes bya ba mthong ngo //

translated: With knowledge derived from hearing he will then perceive a neighboring realm of the great hell known as Coiled Snakes.

original: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des brtags na /
analyzed: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des brtags na /
translated: Wondering what karmic actions may cause beings to take birth there, he will apply knowledge derived from hearing.

original: gang gis srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chang 'thung ba dang / rdzun smra ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chang 'thung ba dang / rdzun smra ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ro //
translated: “What are those? They are resorting to, becoming habituated to, and increasing acts of killing, stealing, sexual misconduct, alcohol consumption, and lying.

original: log par lta ba'ang kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ba ni 'di ltar tsog tsog por bsgyings par 'dug la skom 'thung zhing lag pa la ldag na mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob ste /

translated: “Resorting to, becoming habituated to, and increasing wrong view means to sit with one’s legs stretched out, drink alcohol, and lick one’s hands while saying, ‘By this, I will attain nirvāṇa.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spangs pas ma yin zhing dbang po zhi bas ma yin no zhes smra na de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal ba sprul 'khyil ba lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro //🔽der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /

translated: It is not by abandoning desire, anger, and ignorance, nor by pacifying the faculties.’ When one later separates from one’s body, one will fall into the lower realms, into the hell of Coiled Snakes.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: “The beings in that realm experience the following tortures.

original: kha cig na reg pa'i dug /
analyzed: kha cig na reg pa'i dug /

original: kha cig ni mche ba'i dug ste /
analyzed: kha cig ni mche ba'i dug ste /

original: de dag gis sems can dmyal ba de gang ngo //
analyzed: de dag gis sems can dmyal ba de gang ngo //
translated: Those snakes fill that hell.

original: der sems can dmyal ba kha cig gi nang du sprul de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te gang dag @352a *//
analyzed: der sems can dmyal ba kha cig gi nang du sprul de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te gang dag @352a *//
translated: Some of the snakes appear inside the hell beings.

original: nang du skyes pa la de'i tshe /
analyzed: nang du skyes pa la de'i tshe /
translated: Those who are born inside

analyzed: sprul de dag gi lus reg pas chang pa'i phye bzhin 'thag go /
translated: are crushed by the snakes’ bodies like barley flour.

original: gang dag kha'i nang du skyes pa ni mche ba dang 'dres pa'i dug rab tu 'bar ba de dag gis skye zhing skye zhing yang 'chi'o //
analyzed: gang dag kha'i nang du skyes pa ni mche ba dang 'dres pa'i dug rab tu 'bar ba de dag gis skye zhing skye zhing yang 'chi'o //
translated: Those who are born inside the mouths are born and die again and again from the blazing poison mixed with the fangs.

original: shi nas yang 'tsho ste /
analyzed: shi nas yang 'tsho ste /
translated: After dying, they are born again.

original: de dag me gsum gyis sreg go /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de dag me gsum gyis sreg go /🔽'di lta ste /
translated: They are burned by three fires.🔽What are the three?

original: dug gi me dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i me dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa'i mes de dag rang gi las dang mthun par me gsum gyi dbus su bcug nas tshor ba tsha ba rtsub pa dag myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dug gi me dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i me dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa'i mes de dag rang gi las dang mthun par me gsum gyi dbus su bcug nas tshor ba tsha ba rtsub pa dag myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The fire of poison, the fire of the hell beings, and the fire of hunger and thirst will all burn them in accordance with their karmic actions. Thus, they will experience the three fires and the excruciatingly painful sensations that ensue.

original: gzhan yang / nad las byung ba'i tshor ba brjod par yang mi nus pa'i nad bzhi las byung ba'i mes de sreg go /
analyzed: gzhan yang / nad las byung ba'i tshor ba brjod par yang mi nus pa'i nad bzhi las byung ba'i mes de sreg go /

analyzed: de ltar nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa dag ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du yun ring por me'i nang du bcug nas sreg go / 'thag go / skems so //
translated: Thus, those who have engaged in misdeeds will be placed in the fire and burned for a long time, until finally their negative acts have been overcome, relinquished, and exhausted.

original: rnam par zhigs par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par zhigs par byed do //
translated: They will be ground, dried, and destroyed.

original: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
translated: When they finally escape this hell,

original: thar nas kyang tshe rabs brgya lnga bcur yi dvags khab mgrin du skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: thar nas kyang tshe rabs brgya lnga bcur yi dvags khab mgrin du skye bar 'gyur /
translated: they will be born one hundred and fifty times as starving spirits with needle-like throats.

original: tshe rabs nyis brgyar me dang / chu med pa'i gnas ri sul dpag tshad bcu gnyis par bkres pa dang / skom pa thams cad kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i dud 'gro seng ge dang / stag dang / dred dang / gung du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe rabs nyis brgyar me dang / chu med pa'i gnas ri sul dpag tshad bcu gnyis par bkres pa dang / skom pa thams cad kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i dud 'gro seng ge dang / stag dang / dred dang / gung du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For two hundred lives, they will be born as animals such as lions, tigers, bears, and leopards, who are tormented by hunger and thirst in mountain ravines twelve leagues across, where there is no fire or water.

original: gal te gnya' shing gi bu gar rus spal 'jug pa lta bur mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na /
analyzed: gal te gnya' shing gi bu gar rus spal 'jug pa lta bur mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na /
translated: “If, with the likelihood of a sea turtle poking its head through a yoke floating on the ocean, they should be born with the general lot in life of a human,

original: las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus @352b de 'brog dgon pa'i mir 'gyur te /
analyzed: las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus @352b de 'brog dgon pa'i mir 'gyur te /
translated: the effects of their actions will be in accordance with their causal actions. They will be born in a remote wilderness

original: gang dag gis nam yang kha zas mthong bar mi 'gyur na bza' ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: gang dag gis nam yang kha zas mthong bar mi 'gyur na bza' ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: where they will never see any food, let alone eat any.

original: gzhan du na der rngad dang / rtsva dang / tshal gyi 'bras bus srog 'tsho bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzhan du na der rngad dang / rtsva dang / tshal gyi 'bras bus srog 'tsho bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
translated: They will only be able to sustain their lives by eating grass, plants, and wild fruits.

original: de nas gzhan yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des /
translated: “The monk who has knowledge of the ripening of karmic effects will then continue his investigation of the animal world.

original: sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i 'khor la brtags na /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i 'khor la brtags na /
translated: When he examines the retinue of the great hot hells,🔽

original: des sems can dmyal ba zangs bzhus par nya 'khyug pa lta bu zhes bya ba mthong ngo //🔽der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /🔽gang gis srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chad 'thung ba dang / rdzun smra bas 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des sems can dmyal ba zangs bzhus par nya 'khyug pa lta bu zhes bya ba mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na / gang gis srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chad 'thung ba dang / rdzun smra bas 'gyur ro //
translated: “As he examines the regions that surround the Great Hell of Heat, he will perceive a neighboring realm known as Like a Fish in a Pot of Boiling Water.

original: log par lta ba'ang 'di ltar kun tu bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byas pas 'gyur te /
analyzed: log par lta ba'ang 'di ltar kun tu bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byas pas 'gyur te /
translated: Inquiring into what karmic actions may cause one to be born there, he will apply knowledge derived from hearing and thus perceive that such a birth is due to resorting to, becoming habituated to, and increasing acts of killing, stealing, sexual misconduct, alcohol consumption, and lying.

original: 'dir 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad dbang phyug gis sprul te las kyis ma byas so zhes smra na /
analyzed: 'dir 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad dbang phyug gis sprul te las kyis ma byas so zhes smra na /
translated: Also, in terms of wrong view, one may adhere to the view that all beings in this world were created by Īśvara and not by karmic actions.

original: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba zangs bzhus par nya 'khyug pa lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba zangs bzhus par nya 'khyug pa lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When later such a person separates from the body and falls into the lower realms, he will be born in the hell of Like a Fish in a Pot of Boiling Water.

original: sems can de'ang zangs bzhus pa rab tu 'bar bas rgya mtsho ltar gang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems can de'ang zangs bzhus pa rab tu 'bar bas rgya mtsho ltar gang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Those sentient beings are born in a hell where the water is like a boiling ocean of molten copper.

original: der yang las kyis byas pa'i lcags kyi nya rab tu 'bar ba dag rnam par rgyu zhing zangs bskol ba de'i dbus su shing lo ma spu gri dang / mdung thung lta bu dag 'byung ste /🔽der sems can dmyal @353a *//
analyzed: der yang las kyis byas pa'i lcags kyi nya rab tu 'bar ba dag rnam par rgyu zhing zangs bskol ba de'i dbus su shing lo ma spu gri dang / mdung thung lta bu dag 'byung ste / der sems can dmyal @353a *//
translated: There, iron fish created by karma swim around in the boiling water. In the middle of the boiling water, leaves with razor-sharp edges and spears appear.

original: ba pa de dag skyes nas 'chi zhing skye ste /
analyzed: ba pa de dag skyes nas 'chi zhing skye ste /
translated: Those hell beings are born there and die and are reborn there.

original: yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad zhigs so //
analyzed: yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad zhigs so //
translated: All their major and minor body parts are destroyed.

original: zhugs pa na nub cing 'byung ste tshor bas nyen pa dag phan tshun rgyug cing du skad 'don te //
analyzed: zhugs pa na nub cing 'byung ste tshor bas nyen pa dag phan tshun rgyug cing du skad 'don te //
translated: When they sink down, they come back up. Tormented by their feelings, they run around and cry out.

original: gcig la gcig lag par smras pas de dag de ltar du skad 'don pa na las kyis byas pa'i nya de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag gi drung du kha gdangs shing rgyug go /
analyzed: gcig la gcig lag par smras pas de dag de ltar du skad 'don pa na las kyis byas pa'i nya de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag gi drung du kha gdangs shing rgyug go /
translated: They call out to each other, saying, “Help!” As they cry out like that, the fish created by karma open their mouths and swim toward those hell beings.

original: de nas nya de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa dag kha chu'i zhags pas bzung ste za zhing /
analyzed: de nas nya de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa dag kha chu'i zhags pas bzung ste za zhing /
translated: Then the fish seize the hell beings with their nets of saliva and eat them.

original: de'i tshe so'i bar du phye ma ra brlags so //
analyzed: de'i tshe so'i bar du phye ma ra brlags so //
translated: At that time, they are crushed like sesame seeds between their teeth.

original: de dag gi lus phyed nya rnams kyis zos shing /
analyzed: de dag gi lus phyed nya rnams kyis zos shing /
translated: Half of their bodies are eaten by the fish,

original: phyed zangs bskol bar 'tshed do //🔽de dag tshor ba drag pas nyen la /
analyzed: phyed zangs bskol bar 'tshed do // de dag tshor ba drag pas nyen la /
translated: and half are boiled in the boiling copper.🔽They experience the pain of being burned by the intense heat,

original: tsha ba rtsub pa'i tshor ba gnyis myong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: tsha ba rtsub pa'i tshor ba gnyis myong bar 'gyur te /
translated: and they experience the pain of being boiled in the boiling copper.

original: de nya de rnams kyis phyed za ba dang / phyed zangs bskol bar 'tshed do //
analyzed: de nya de rnams kyis phyed za ba dang / phyed zangs bskol bar 'tshed do //
translated: Half of their bodies are eaten by the fish, and half are boiled in the boiling copper.

original: yun ring mo zhig 'das nas nya'i kha de nas thar ba dang / zangs bskol ba'i bum pa'i nang du 'jug go /
analyzed: yun ring mo zhig 'das nas nya'i kha de nas thar ba dang / zangs bskol ba'i bum pa'i nang du 'jug go /
translated: After a long time, they escape from the mouth of the fish and enter the pot of boiling copper.

original: zhugs pa dang / srin bu aa ba m'a si ka zhes bya ba rdo rje lta bur mche ba rno ba dug dpag tu med pa de dag gis bzung ngo //
analyzed: zhugs pa dang / srin bu aa ba m'a si ka zhes bya ba rdo rje lta bur mche ba rno ba dug dpag tu med pa de dag gis bzung ngo //
translated: When they enter, they are seized by the worms called avamāsika, whose fangs are sharp like vajra and whose poison is immeasurable.

original: bzung ba rnams zangs bskol ba'i bum pa mun par gyur pa der phye mar rlog go /
analyzed: bzung ba rnams zangs bskol ba'i bum pa mun par gyur pa der phye mar rlog go /
translated: Those seized are crushed to dust in that pot of boiling copper, which is like darkness.

original: phye mar brlags nas phye ma'i dum bu tsam du za'o //
analyzed: phye mar brlags nas phye ma'i dum bu tsam du za'o //
translated: They eat it in the form of dust particles.

original: gang tshor bas nyen pa du skad 'don pa dag zangs bskol pas kha 'gengs shing du skad 'don te /
analyzed: gang tshor bas nyen pa du skad 'don pa dag zangs bskol pas kha 'gengs shing du skad 'don te /
translated: Those who are tormented by feeling cry out. Their mouths are filled with boiling copper.

original: de dag gis 'dzag sgo zangs bskol ba des 'gengs shing 'gog la 'tshed cing @353b rnam par zhigs par byed do //
analyzed: de dag gis 'dzag sgo zangs bskol ba des 'gengs shing 'gog la 'tshed cing @353b rnam par zhigs par byed do //
translated: The boiling copper fills their mouths, blocks them, and burns and destroys them.

original: zangs bskol ba de las yun ring mo zhig 'das nas yang rkyal lo //
analyzed: zangs bskol ba de las yun ring mo zhig 'das nas yang rkyal lo //
translated: After a long time, they emerge from the boiling copper.

original: rkyal nas kyang las kyis byas pa'i rlung spu gri lta bu rnams kyis ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du log par smra ba las dang / 'bras bu la slu bar zhugs pa dag phye mar rlog go /
analyzed: rkyal nas kyang las kyis byas pa'i rlung spu gri lta bu rnams kyis ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du log par smra ba las dang / 'bras bu la slu bar zhugs pa dag phye mar rlog go /
translated: Then, by the power of karma, winds like razors appear and grind them into dust for as long as their negative actions have not been overcome, relinquished, and exhausted.

original: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
translated: When they finally escape this hell,

original: thar nas kyang tshe rabs sum brgyar yi dvags kha zas med pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thar nas kyang tshe rabs sum brgyar yi dvags kha zas med pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will next be born three hundred times as a hungry ghost with no food.

original: yi dvags kyi yul de las thar nas kyang tshe rabs sum brgyar dud 'gro glang po che dang / dom dang; grog spur la sogs pa shin tu sdug bsngal ba rtag tu bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang /
analyzed: yi dvags kyi yul de las thar nas kyang tshe rabs sum brgyar dud 'gro glang po che dang / dom dang; grog spur la sogs pa shin tu sdug bsngal ba rtag tu bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang /
translated: Once free from the realm of starving spirits, they will be born three hundred times as animals, such as elephants, bears, and ants. They will always suffer, be hungry and thirsty, and experience cold, heat,

original: rlung dang / gdung ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rlung dang / gdung ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: wind, and torment.

original: dud 'gro de las thar nas kyang gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de khyis 'tsho
analyzed: dud 'gro de las thar nas kyang gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de khyis 'tsho
translated: “Once free from the animal realm, they will, as if a turtle were to enter the hole of a yoke, if due to karmic actions to be experienced in other lives, be born with the general lot in life of a human, in terms of effects that accord with their causal actions, they will be born as a dog keeper,🔽a woodcutter,

original: ba'am / shing thun nam /🔽nya par skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
analyzed: ba'am / shing thun nam / nya par skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
translated: or a fisherman.

original: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i 'khor la brtags na /
analyzed: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i 'khor la brtags na /
translated: “As the monk who has knowledge of the effects of the ripening of karmic actions continues to examine the regions that surround the great Hell of Heat, he will apply insight derived from hearing and thus perceive a neighboring realm known as Tormented by Heat.

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba lcags kyi bum pa zhes bya bar mthong ngo //
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba lcags kyi bum pa zhes bya bar mthong ngo //
translated: Through his knowledge derived from hearing, he saw that there is a hell called Iron Pot.

original: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam @354a *//
analyzed: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam @354a *//
translated: What type of karma causes beings to take birth there?

original: nas des brtags na /
analyzed: nas des brtags na /
translated: He saw that it is caused by resorting to, becoming habituated with,

original: gang gis srog gcod pa dang / ma byin pa len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chang 'thung ba dang / rdzun smra ba kun tu bsten cing /🔽bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis srog gcod pa dang / ma byin pa len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chang 'thung ba dang / rdzun smra ba kun tu bsten cing / bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ro //
translated: and increasing acts of killing, stealing, sexual misconduct, alcohol consumption, and lying.

original: log par lta ba ni 'di ltar mtho ris su mi 'di dbang du 'gyur ro zhes mchod sbyin dag la mi dag gsod par byed pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu dbang du bya ba'i phyir rus sbal dag gsod par byed cing gzhan dag kyang rab tu 'jog par byed pa nas skye ba'i bar du byed pa yin te /
analyzed: log par lta ba ni 'di ltar mtho ris su mi 'di dbang du 'gyur ro zhes mchod sbyin dag la mi dag gsod par byed pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu dbang du bya ba'i phyir rus sbal dag gsod par byed cing gzhan dag kyang rab tu 'jog par byed pa nas skye ba'i bar du byed pa yin te /
translated: He saw that wrong view is when one thinks, “Through this, I will gain power in the higher realms,” and then kills people in order to make offerings, kills turtles in order to gain power in the next world, and causes others to do the same, up to and including killing.

original: lam bzang po sun par byed cing lam ngan pa la 'jog par byed pa'i las kyi rnam pa 'di dag ni log par lta ba yin no //
analyzed: lam bzang po sun par byed cing lam ngan pa la 'jog par byed pa'i las kyi rnam pa 'di dag ni log par lta ba yin no //
translated: These are the actions that constitute wrong view.

original: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba lcags kyi bum par skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba lcags kyi bum par skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: “When they later separate from their bodies, they will fall into the lower realms, taking birth in the hell known as Iron Pot.

original: der sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa'i gnod pa 'di dag thams cad bcu 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: der sems can dmyal ba yang sos la sogs pa'i gnod pa 'di dag thams cad bcu 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
translated: In that realm, all the tortures of the Reviving Hell are increased a hundredfold.

original: bum pa dpag tshad bcu pa drug 'byung ste /🔽de dag gi ming ni 'di dag yin te /
analyzed: bum pa dpag tshad bcu pa drug 'byung ste / de dag gi ming ni 'di dag yin te /
translated: The iron pots there are ten leagues in size.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: The following are the names of the hells that are located there:

original: zhugs ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang / skyabs med pa dang / rtag tu mes bskol ba dang / chu sog le lta bu dang / spu gri'i phreng ba dang / chu bskol ba'i nang du sprul zhugs pa'o; ;der gang dag sdug bsngal mtshungs par 'tshed pa de dag la rnam pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal 'byung ste /
analyzed: zhugs ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang / skyabs med pa dang / rtag tu mes bskol ba dang / chu sog le lta bu dang / spu gri'i phreng ba dang / chu bskol ba'i nang du sprul zhugs pa'o; ;der gang dag sdug bsngal mtshungs par 'tshed pa de dag la rnam pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal 'byung ste /
translated: Immediately upon entering, one suffers; there is no refuge; one is constantly boiled; there is a water saw; there is a garland of razors; and there is a snake in boiling water.

original: gang du sems can dmyal ba pa de dag 'tshed pa na tshor ba'i sdug bsngal @354b yang mtha' dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du sems can dmyal ba pa de dag 'tshed pa na tshor ba'i sdug bsngal @354b yang mtha' dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Wherever the hell beings are boiled, all the suffering of feeling occurs.

original: gang skyabs med pa /
analyzed: gang skyabs med pa /
translated: They have no refuge.

original: 'tshed pa de dag la lus kyi skyabs kyang med cing yid dang chos kyi skyabs kyang med de /
analyzed: 'tshed pa de dag la lus kyi skyabs kyang med cing yid dang chos kyi skyabs kyang med de /
translated: They are boiled without a physical refuge, without a mental refuge, without a refuge in the Dharma.

original: gang ngan 'gro'i skyabs can de dag thams cad de na skyabs med do //
analyzed: gang ngan 'gro'i skyabs can de dag thams cad de na skyabs med do //
translated: All those who are in the lower realms have no refuge there.

original: gang rtag tu mes bskol ba yun ring por 'tshed pa de dag ni mes bskol pa'i zangs bzhus pa las byung bas ji ltar thal ba'ang mi mngon pa de ltar lus rnam par zhigs par byed do //
analyzed: gang rtag tu mes bskol ba yun ring por 'tshed pa de dag ni mes bskol pa'i zangs bzhus pa las byung bas ji ltar thal ba'ang mi mngon pa de ltar lus rnam par zhigs par byed do //
translated: Those who are constantly boiled for a long time by the fire are burned by the boiling copper so that not even ashes remain.

original: de nas yang lus de skye bar 'gyur te /🔽chu sog le lta bu der 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: de nas yang lus de skye bar 'gyur te / chu sog le lta bu der 'jug par byed do //
translated: Then that body is born again.🔽It is made to enter that water which is like a saw.

original: zangs bskol ba'i chu de sog le lta bu yin te /
analyzed: zangs bskol ba'i chu de sog le lta bu yin te /
translated: That boiling copper water is like a saw.

original: de dag thams cad me 'bar ba mtshed pa der bcug pa dang / 'og nas steng du 'byung zhing zangs bskol ba'i chu sog le lta bur gnad dang gnad dag la gnod par byed /
analyzed: de dag thams cad me 'bar ba mtshed pa der bcug pa dang / 'og nas steng du 'byung zhing zangs bskol ba'i chu sog le lta bur gnad dang gnad dag la gnod par byed /
translated: and from below to above, and from above to below, the boiling water of the copper cauldron cuts through their vital points and injures them.

original: gshig par byed do //
analyzed: gshig par byed do //
translated: It splits them apart.

original: de nas yang de las steng nas 'og tu 'byung ste /
analyzed: de nas yang de las steng nas 'og tu 'byung ste /
translated: Then again, from above to below,

original: sog le de dag nyid kyis gsheg cing 'bral lo //
analyzed: sog le de dag nyid kyis gsheg cing 'bral lo //
translated: those razors cut and separate them.

original: mon sran gre'u lta bu'i rigs de dag lus steng dang / 'og dang / sa'i ngos la yun ring du 'joms so /
analyzed: mon sran gre'u lta bu'i rigs de dag lus steng dang / 'og dang / sa'i ngos la yun ring du 'joms so /
translated: Those of the mung bean type are crushed, split apart, and burned for a long time on the surface of the body, below, and on the ground.

original: gshig go / sreg go /
analyzed: gshig go / sreg go /
translated: They are cut, split apart, and burned.

original: spu gri'i phreng ba'i nang du 'jug pa de dag la gnod pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: spu gri'i phreng ba'i nang du 'jug pa de dag la gnod pa 'byung ste /
translated: Those who enter the garland of razors experience harm.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: bum pa de spu gri rnams kyis gang ba yin te /
analyzed: bum pa de spu gri rnams kyis gang ba yin te /
translated: That pot is filled with razors.

original: der sems can dmyal ba pa dag spu gri dug gis gos pa de dag gis yan lag dang nyid lag gsheg par byed do //
analyzed: der sems can dmyal ba pa dag spu gri dug gis gos pa de dag gis yan lag dang nyid lag gsheg par byed do //
translated: The hell beings there are cut to pieces by those razors covered with poison.

original: chu bskol ba'i nang du sprul zhugs pa de dag la gnod pa 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: chu bskol ba'i nang du sprul zhugs pa de dag la gnod pa 'byung ba ni /
translated: The harm that befalls those who enter the boiling water is this:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: chu bskol ba dpag tshad phyed du bskol ba shin tu tsha ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: chu bskol ba dpag tshad phyed du bskol ba shin tu tsha ba 'byung ste /
translated: The boiling water in the cauldron, which is half a league in size, becomes extremely hot.

original: @355a *// der dbu ba'i nang na sbrul gnas pa mche ba mchog tu rno ba dag reg pa dang / mthong bas me bzhin du sreg go /
analyzed: @355a *// der dbu ba'i nang na sbrul gnas pa mche ba mchog tu rno ba dag reg pa dang / mthong bas me bzhin du sreg go /
translated: There, the snakes that live in the foam have extremely sharp fangs that burn like fire through contact and sight.

original: reg pas spu gri bzhin du gcod do //
analyzed: reg pas spu gri bzhin du gcod do //

analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa de dag sprul de dag gis gcod par byed do //

analyzed: des sems can dmyal ba pa dag 'bros par byed mi nus so //

original: de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag 'di snyam du sems te /

analyzed: 'di ltar sems can dmyal ba pa bu ga med pa'i bum pa'i nang 'dir zhugs pa dag rdo rje lta bu'i skyang nul gyis bu ga med par byas /

analyzed: gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can dmyal ba pa dag 'bros mi nus par bya'o snyam du sems so //

original: de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Then the henchmen of the Lord of Death think,

analyzed: de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag la gnod pa de dag gis gnod par byed do //
translated: Then they will harm the hell beings with those harms.

translated: When the beings in the hells go up, they are harmed by the boiling red copper.🔽They are tormented by various painful harms.

analyzed: kha cig ni sbrul gdug pa me ltar tsha bas skol cing sreg par byed do //

analyzed: de dag bum pa'i gnod pa de las thar bar 'gyur te /

translated: For the sake of wealth or

translated: heaven, they will then engage in the accumulation of meat.

translated: “As the monk who has knowledge of the effects of the ripening of karmic actions continues to examine the regions that surround the great Hell of Heat, he will apply knowledge derived from hearing and thus perceive a neighboring realm known as Flow of Red Waters.

analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas @356a *//

analyzed: brtags na / tshul khrims 'chal ba gang gis tshul khrims 'chal ba mang du byas nas phyis de 'di snyam du sems te /

analyzed: shing la rkang pa btags nas mgo mthur du dbyangs te / mtshon chas sna 'am /

analyzed: de las gang khrag byung ba de dag mer bsreg blugs byed do //

analyzed: der gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /

analyzed: ji ltar chu bo des deng pa de ltar sems can dmyal ba pa sgra dang / rus pas mu khebs pa gzhan dag kyang chu bo des ded do //

translated: As long as their misdeeds of wrong views are not overcome, abandoned, and exhausted, for that long they will experience harm in the River of Blood for a long time.

original: de phyis sems dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de phyis sems dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /

analyzed: de las thar nas tshe rabs bzhi brgyar dud 'gro rgya mtsho'i byar skye ste /

translated: “If, with the likelihood of a sea turtle poking its head through a yoke floating on the ocean, he should be born with the general lot in life of a human, he will, in terms of effects that accord with the relevant causal actions, be poor and sickly.

translated: “As the monk who has knowledge of the effects of the ripening of karmic actions continues to examine the regions that surround the great Hell of Heat, he will apply knowledge derived from hearing and thus perceive a neighboring realm of the great hell of Heat known as Many Bones and Parasites.

original: brtags na / lus sam /
analyzed: brtags na / lus sam /
translated: Inquiring into what karmic actions may cause one to be born there, he will apply knowledge derived from hearing and thus perceive how some people, with their bodies,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: de'i ri de sreg pa na 'phang du mes dpag tshad bcu tsam du 'bar bar byed de /

analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa de dag rang gi lus las byung ba'i me dang srin bu de dag gis lhan cig sreg par byed do //
