analyzed: srin bu bad kan rlan byed la rlung sna 'phul rengs byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The phlegm-moistener worm is harmed by the wind that stiffens the nose.

original: srin bu rab tu skyug byed la rlung ro bro ba bcu khyer ba nang du rgyu zhing du shya ga ta ldog byed kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu rab tu skyug byed la rlung ro bro ba bcu khyer ba nang du rgyu zhing du shya ga ta ldog byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm excrement-eater is harmed by the wind that moves the ten smells.

original: srin bu sbrang rtsi myos la rlung tshigs 'khrugs byed kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu sbrang rtsi myos la rlung tshigs 'khrugs byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm honey-drunk is harmed by the wind that disturbs the joints.

original: srin bu ro drug sred la rlung spu dang / sen mo dang / bshang ba 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //🔽srin bu bar bur la rlung kha chu 'khrul byed kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu ro drug sred la rlung spu dang / sen mo dang / bshang ba 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do // srin bu bar bur la rlung kha chu 'khrul byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm six-taste-eater is harmed by the wind that destroys hair, nails, and excrement.🔽The worm pustule is harmed by the wind that disturbs saliva.

original: srin bu ro yid 'byung la rlung shig shig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu ro yid 'byung la rlung shig shig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm disgusted-by-impurity is harmed by the wind that causes shivering.

original: srin bu rmi lam srid la rlung 'doms rengs kyis gnod par byed do //🔽srin bu spu za la rlung bshang ba skams byed kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu rmi lam srid la rlung 'doms rengs kyis gnod par byed do // srin bu spu za la rlung bshang ba skams byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm dream-existence is harmed by the wind that paralyzes the anus.🔽The worm hair-eater is harmed by the wind that dries up excrement.

original: srin bu so su ra la rlung rtsib logs 'ching byed kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu so su ra la rlung rtsib logs 'ching byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm sushira is harmed by the wind that binds the ribs.

original: srin bu skye ba'i ma la rlung khva bu ga drug gis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu skye ba'i ma la rlung khva bu ga drug gis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm mother of lice is harmed by the wind that opens and closes the six orifices.

original: srin bu au ma pa ra la rlung yan lag dang / nying lag 'thung byed kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu au ma pa ra la rlung yan lag dang / nying lag 'thung byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm umpara is harmed by the wind that drinks the limbs and secondary limbs.

original: srin bu ra ba zag la rlung me 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu ra ba zag la rlung me 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm ravaja is harmed by the wind that destroys fire.🔽The worm romakarika is harmed by the wind that moves the limbs and secondary limbs.

original: srin bu spu gling la rlung yan lag dang / nying lag kun byed kyis gnod par byed @413b do; ;srin bu spu zan la rlung brtan 'gems kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu spu gling la rlung yan lag dang / nying lag kun byed kyis gnod par byed @413b do; ;srin bu spu zan la rlung brtan 'gems kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm romakarika is harmed by the wind that destroys stability.

original: srin bu si mi si ma la rlung yan lag kun khyab kyis gnod par byed do //🔽srin bu au ma bu ga la rlung sreg byed kyis gnod par byed do //🔽srin bu rmas bslang la rlung 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu si mi si ma la rlung yan lag kun khyab kyis gnod par byed do // srin bu au ma bu ga la rlung sreg byed kyis gnod par byed do // srin bu rmas bslang la rlung 'jig byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm simisimika is harmed by the wind that pervades all the limbs.🔽The worm urabhaga is harmed by the wind that burns.🔽The worm udbhid is harmed by the wind that destroys.

original: srin bu btsun tsu skra la rlung steng 'og gis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu btsun tsu skra la rlung steng 'og gis gnod par byed do //
translated: The worm śukra is harmed by the wind that moves above and below.

original: srin bu rgyus pa gcod la rlung mi'i srog gang la song ba 'chi byed kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: srin bu rgyus pa gcod la rlung mi'i srog gang la song ba 'chi byed kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: The wind that harms the worm that cuts the sinews is the life-destroyer.

original: srin bu rtsa gcod la rlung mig 'byed kyis gnod par byed do /
analyzed: srin bu rtsa gcod la rlung mig 'byed kyis gnod par byed do /
translated: The wind that harms the worm that cuts the channels is the eye-opener.

original: ji ltar srog chags thams cad 'chi ba'i dus su srin bu dag la rlung dag gis so so nges par gnod pa byed pa de ltar mnar med pa'i ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar srog chags thams cad 'chi ba'i dus su srin bu dag la rlung dag gis so so nges par gnod pa byed pa de ltar mnar med pa'i ma yin te /
translated: Just as at the time of death of all living beings, the worms are harmed by the winds, so it is not in Avīci.

original: de'i las ngan pa byas pas 'og dang / steng du mi mthun pa'i las kyis byas pa'i rlung rab tu drag pa dag so sor ldang ste /
analyzed: de'i las ngan pa byas pas 'og dang / steng du mi mthun pa'i las kyis byas pa'i rlung rab tu drag pa dag so sor ldang ste /
translated: Because of their bad karma, violent winds created by incompatible karma rise up below and above.

original: de ltar rlung brgyad cu dag gis srin bu brgyad cu dag la gnod par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar rlung brgyad cu dag gis srin bu brgyad cu dag la gnod par byed do //
translated: Thus, the eighty winds harm the eighty worms.

original: rlung dag gis ji lta ji ltar srin bu dag la gnod par byed pa bzlog pa de lta bu mi byed do //
analyzed: rlung dag gis ji lta ji ltar srin bu dag la gnod par byed pa bzlog pa de lta bu mi byed do //
translated: The winds do not act to prevent the harm to the worms as they do.

original: dang por rlung bib pa la ka dri zhim pa dang gis de'i lus thams cad ji ltar bu ram shing dbang shing gis btsir ba de ltar skams par byed do //
analyzed: dang por rlung bib pa la ka dri zhim pa dang gis de'i lus thams cad ji ltar bu ram shing dbang shing gis btsir ba de ltar skams par byed do //
translated: First, the wind called “fragrant” dries out the entire body of that being, just as sugarcane is dried by being pressed between machines.

original: khrag thams cad skams par byed /
analyzed: khrag thams cad skams par byed /
translated: It dries up all the blood.

original: gnad thams cad du gnod par byed /
analyzed: gnad thams cad du gnod par byed /
translated: It harms all the vital organs.

original: rgyus pa thams cad gcod par byed /
analyzed: rgyus pa thams cad gcod par byed /
translated: It cuts all the sinews.

original: sdug bsngal gyis rkang thams cad rab tu 'ju bar byed do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyis rkang thams cad rab tu 'ju bar byed do //
translated: It burns all the limbs with pain.

original: nyes par byas pa /
analyzed: nyes par byas pa /
translated: Having done wrong,

original: las kyi mthar spyad pa 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mnar @414a *//
analyzed: las kyi mthar spyad pa 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mnar @414a *//
translated: having practiced evil deeds, at the time of death

original: med pa de'i khar srin bu gsal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa de'i khar srin bu gsal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the worm will appear in the mouth of that being in the Avīci hell.

original: sems can dmyal ba pa de'i khyim ni /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa de'i khyim ni /
translated: The house of that hell being

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is like this:

original: ko ba nag pos g-yogs shing phyogs gcig tu rab tu 'bar ba dang / yang ko ba nag po de'i phyogs gcig nas me 'byung ste /
analyzed: ko ba nag pos g-yogs shing phyogs gcig tu rab tu 'bar ba dang / yang ko ba nag po de'i phyogs gcig nas me 'byung ste /
translated: covered with black leather, burning on one side, and on one side of that black leather, fire arises.

original: khang pa'i nang thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo //
analyzed: khang pa'i nang thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo //
translated: The entire interior of the house is seen to be burning.

original: des khyim rab tu 'bar par mthong nas bzhin mog mog por 'gyur te /
analyzed: des khyim rab tu 'bar par mthong nas bzhin mog mog por 'gyur te /
translated: Seeing the house on fire, his face becomes pale.

original: du zhing skad 'byin la lag pa g-yob par byed /
analyzed: du zhing skad 'byin la lag pa g-yob par byed /
translated: He cries out, he waves his arms.

original: mig 'gul bar byed /
analyzed: mig 'gul bar byed /
translated: His eyes move.

original: kha nas kha chu 'dzag par 'gyur /🔽so dag gis so dag la 'debs par byed /
analyzed: kha nas kha chu 'dzag par 'gyur / so dag gis so dag la 'debs par byed /
translated: His mouth is dry.🔽He bites his teeth with his teeth.

original: mchus mchu la reg par byed do //
analyzed: mchus mchu la reg par byed do //
translated: He touches his lips with his lips.

original: snang ba gnyis pa mthong ba ni mun pa mun nag thibs por gyur cing ri brag chen po la so sor 'jigs pa chen po seng ge dang / stag dang / dred dang / gung dang / sbrul 'jigs pas gang ba steng du 'ong ba mthong nas bshang ba 'byin to //
analyzed: snang ba gnyis pa mthong ba ni mun pa mun nag thibs por gyur cing ri brag chen po la so sor 'jigs pa chen po seng ge dang / stag dang / dred dang / gung dang / sbrul 'jigs pas gang ba steng du 'ong ba mthong nas bshang ba 'byin to //
translated: He sees a second light: a great mountain, thick with darkness, filled with great terrors, lions, tigers, panthers, hyenas, and snakes, which advances on him. He defecates out of fear.

original: de'i steng du ri de 'ong ba'i 'jigs pas lag pa rkyong bar byed pa dang / de nye du dag gis mthong nas nam mkha' la reg bar 'dod do zhes smra'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ri de 'ong ba'i 'jigs pas lag pa rkyong bar byed pa dang / de nye du dag gis mthong nas nam mkha' la reg bar 'dod do zhes smra'o //
translated: Above him, he sees the mountain advancing; he stretches out his arms. His relatives, seeing him, say to him: “He wants to touch the sky.”

original: de'i 'og tu de bzhin du ri brag dang / nags tshal dang / ri 'or dang / lcug tshal mang po 'bar ba'i phreng ba steng du 'ong bar mthong ste; shin tu 'khrul pa du skad 'byin cing sgra ngar ngar po 'thon la bshang ba 'byin to //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu de bzhin du ri brag dang / nags tshal dang / ri 'or dang / lcug tshal mang po 'bar ba'i phreng ba steng du 'ong bar mthong ste; shin tu 'khrul pa du skad 'byin cing sgra ngar ngar po 'thon la bshang ba 'byin to //
translated: Then, in the same way, he sees a garland of blazing mountains, forests, valleys, and thickets coming down on him, and he cries out in great confusion, with a loud voice and with excrement flowing.
